goal.outcome_goal: Touch toes with knees extended by end of Week 3
progress_goals: Increase hip and shoulder mobility by 10° using mobility benchmarks
Reduce DOMS by at least 30% through consistent stretching and rolling

sessions.name: Session 1
components: Foam Roll: Calves, Quads, Lats (30 sec each)
Static Stretch: Hamstring, Hip Flexor, Chest, Lat (30 sec x 2 rounds)
Breathing: 5 min deep belly breathing in supine position

sessions.name: Session 2
components: Foam Roll: Glutes, IT Band, Thoracic Spine
Static Stretch: Glute Figure-4, Adductors, Neck
Seated forward fold (2 mins)

sessions.name: Session 3
components: Yoga Flow: Child’s pose, Cobra, Downward Dog, Seated Twist
Static Hold: Pigeon pose (1 min each leg), Supine Twist
Diaphragmatic breathing to finish

sessions.name: Session 1
components: Foam Roll: Calves, Quads
Active-Isolated Stretch: Hamstring, Hip Flexor, Chest (8–10 reps each)
Static hold for tightest areas (30 sec)

sessions.name: Session 2
components: Band-assisted active stretches: Shoulders, Hip Flexors
Supine Leg Swings + Standing Arm Circles
Supine knees-to-chest hold (2 min)

sessions.name: Session 3
components: Mobility Circuit: Cat-Cow, 90/90 Transitions, World’s Greatest Stretch
Static: Standing Forward Bend, Shoulder Thread-the-Needle

sessions.name: Session 1
components: Dynamic Warm-Up: Leg Swings, Arm Circles, Inchworms, Hip Openers
Static Post-Workout: Hamstrings, Adductors, Triceps, Neck

sessions.name: Session 2
components: Foam Rolling (short): Quads and Lats
Dynamic: Spinal rolls, Deep squats with hold, Arm crosses
Yoga Flow: 3 rounds of Sun Salutation A

sessions.name: Session 3
components: Full Body Flow: Downward Dog to Lunge, Cobra to Child’s Pose, Supine Leg Raise to Seated Twist
